exceptions.exn: The reference g was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hf' was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: now intros H1 H2 H x y ->.

original: unfold isPR. intros f' g Hf' Hg. exists (fun x => g (f x) (f' x)). intros n. generalize (Hf' n) (Hg (f n)). now intros H1 H2 H x y ->.
